info.title: Power Assist
info.description: Power Assist provides a variety of utility and data manipulation actions to accelerate and empower your Power Platform development.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

post.summary: Sort Array
post.description: Perform a simple sort on an array of any data type.

post.description: Reverse the order of an array of any data type.

post.description: Accepts an Array of Objects and sorts it by the object Property specified.

post.summary: Filter Array
post.description: Filter an array of any data type based on a specified condition.

post.summary: Prepend to Array
post.description: Given an Array and a Value, this action adds the value as the first item in the Array. If an Array is supplied as the Value, a flat array will be returned with each of the items prepended.

post.summary: Check whether Any of the Items in an Array meet a condition
post.description: This action returns True if any of the items in an array match a specified condition; otherwise, it returns False.

post.summary: Remove First
post.description: Accepts an Array of any data type. Returns an Array with the first Item that matches the specified condition removed. If no Item matches the condition, the entire Array is returned.

post.summary: Array - Group By
post.description: Group an Array of items. Accepts an Array of any data type. Returns an Object with keys that reflect the values of the provided propertyName. Under each key are the items that reflect the value.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Array - Find First
post.description: Get the first item in an Array that meets a specified condition. If no item matches, Null is returned.

Result.description: The rounded number as an integer.
Result.title: Result

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Round Up Number (aka Math.ceil)
post.description: Rounds a number to the nearest integer. Supports numbers passed in as strings, but does NOT support commas or other formatting in number strings. If an integer is passed in, it will be returned unchanged.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Round Down Number (aka Math.floor)
post.description: Rounds a number down to the nearest integer. Supports numbers passed in as strings, but does NOT support commas or other formatting in number strings. If an integer is passed in, it will be returned unchanged.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Calculate Average (Arithmetic Mean) from an Array of Numbers
post.description: Calculates the average (mean) from an Array of numbers. Strings that can be converted to numbers are allowed, but formatting such as commas are NOT supported.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Calculate Median from an Array of Numbers
post.description: Calculates the median from an Array of numbers. Strings that can be converted to numbers are allowed, but formatting such as commas are NOT supported.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Calculate Mode (most frequently occurring number) from an Array of Numbers
post.description: Calculates the mode from an Array of numbers. Strings that can be converted to numbers are allowed, but formatting such as commas are NOT supported. If multiple instances of the same number are passed in separately as a string and a number, they will be counted as instances of the same number.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Generate a Random Number
post.description: Generates a random number between the minimum of 0 and the specified maximum (maximum must be 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000).

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: String Replace All - Replace all instances of a substring
post.description: Is case sensitive. Does not accept RegEx. To use RegEx, see the "String RegEx Replace" action.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: String RegEx Replace - replace values in a string using a Regular Expression
post.description: Find and replace within a String using a RegEx pattern. Include the leading and trailing '/' in your pattern and optionally append flags. If the /g flag is used, it will replace all occurrences. Use the /i flag to make the search ignore case.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Capitalize String - set first character to upper case
post.description: Sets the first character of the string to upper case, and all subsequent characters to lower case.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Trim String - remove characters from the start and end of a string
post.description: Trims leading and trailing whitespace (the default) or specified characters from a string.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Trim Start of String
post.description: Trim whitespace (the default) or specified characters only at the start of a string.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Trim End of String
post.description: Trim whitespace (by default) or specified characters from the end of a string.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Slugify String - transform text into an ASCII slug which can be used in URLs
post.description: Transform text into an ASCII slug which can be used in safely in URLs. Replaces whitespaces, accentuated, and special characters with a dash. Many non-ascii characters are transformed to similar versions in the ascii character set.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.description: Split string by delimiter (String or RegEx pattern). The action splits by whitespace by default. If using RegEx, include the leading and trailing '/' in your pattern and optionally append flags.
post.summary: Split String into Array of Words

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.summary: Count Words in String by Specified Delimiter
post.description: Count the words in a String by a delimiter (String or RegEx pattern). The delimiter is whitespace by default. If using RegEx, include the leading and trailing '/' in your pattern and optionally append flags.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

404.description: 404 Not Found - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

500.description: 500 Internal Server Error - if this issue persists, reach out to powerassistsupport@elevate-digital.com.

post.description: Remove all HTML and XML tags from a string.

post.summary: Clean a String - trim and replace multiple spaces with a single space
post.description: Trim and replace multiple spaces with a single space. (This includes whitespace characters like \t and \n.)

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

post.summary: Clean Diacritics from a String
post.description: Replace all diacritic characters (letters with glyphs) in a string with the closest ASCII equivalents.

post.summary: Escape HTML in a String
post.description: Convert HTML special characters, like < and >, to their entity equivalents. This action supports cent, yen, euro, pound, lt, gt, copy, reg, quote, amp, and apos.

post.summary: Unescape HTML in a String
post.description: Convert entity characters (such as <) to HTML equivalents. This action supports cent, yen, euro, pound, lt, gt, copy, reg, quote, amp, apos, and nbsp.

401.description: 401 Unauthorized - Please check that you have the correct RapidAPI Key and RapidAPI subscription level to use this action.

post.summary: Check that a Value is an Object
post.description: Validate whether a supplied Value is an Object. Empty Objects will evaluate to True. Arrays and other data types will evaluate to False.

post.summary: Validate Email - check that a String is in the common email format
post.description: Validates that a String matches the common email format. Does NOT send an email. Returns True if it passes; otherwise, False.

post.summary: Validate a String based on RegEx
post.description: Validates that a String against a supplied RegEx pattern. Include the leading and trailing '/' in your RegEx pattern and optionally append flags.
